i decided im going to go ahead and update. today wasent bad i hung out with skylar for a bit and when she left, laura came around  so i got to spend few pleasureable moments with her. then after i went to pick up our little tatiana from school and i went to safeway with her and got those gummi sharks and  those are great.

i had to meet with some guy about my water polo, apprently i can get into santa barbara next year if i can get my gpa to a 3.0 they even offered a scholarship. it was a big suprize.

looking forward to the weekend, it feels like this week is going by sooo slow.

um....thats all.

to a special someone (you know who you are)

ill never have the heart or nerve to tell you to your face again but i need to let you know so here it goes. i know your hurting, and i know exactly why. i wanna be there with you making sure your ok no matter what. i know you fear m because iof wghat i did to one of your good friends. i need you to know that i like her, shes a cool girl, but its not the same as it is with you. shes cool shes fun, but with you, theres an insane amount of chemisrty. i would never do that  to you, i would be the perfect guy for you. ive been waiting ast the sidelines for a long time hoping youll give me an oppertunity to show you what i have to offer. 

but what im really here to say is that i HATE hwo you say your unwanted, cause believe me, you never are. i dont care what the people at your school think, and i dont care if they think that your unwanted or annoying. i know that i want you, and have for a really long time, and i know that means that you are in fact wanted. i know ive wronged you, and i wouldnt be suprised is you never wanted me and i wouldnt blame you either, i just want you to know that your beautiful, your smart, your funny, your sexy and your just such an unbelivable girl that i am ready to giv just about anything i have to be with you.

ill be there, no matter what. i wont make passes at you, i wont ever hurt you or wrong you. im so glad you found comfort in me as a friend and im perfectly content with things stayng that way. 

bottom line: i want you and i always will. you are NEVER UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCE unwanted.

-your friend, ryan.

tanya, i love you and im here for you no matter what.

wrongwaylbc is a slutty bitch. lol, haha fuck her.

nothing new really up lately, but im here to say that i love tanya because she is kind and loveable and she brings happiness to everyone around her and no matter what happens, i will make my sole purpose of living to make sure she gets through allof this ok, for ebtter of for worse.

now coms the hard part. 

i would like to wish a happy halloween to all my friends. so joel, tanya, mark, david, morgan, brent, bianca, peter and other...HAPPY HALLOWEEN!

but i would like to make a special shotu otu to skylar. i wish you the happiest halloween of them all. :)

well, i made a big boo boo with tanya. lucky for me, shes a cool girl and is going to let it go.

life been going to shits. doing worse in my classes then i thought, and all the guys on the team seem to be pissed off.

skylar is still all pissed off with really sucks cause i thought maybe she and i could get something going. but i was wrong....again.

things just get worse and worse.

so i hear tanyas single again...

already got big plans.
well, ive been leaveing comments anonomously for so long, i thought itd be easier to just get a journal. i cant guarentee ill write in it, but well see as we go along now wont we?
